alert.note: Alert for Russell; Washington (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 14 at 4:58AM EDT by NWS Knoxville
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northeastern Sullivan, northeastern Johnson, central Russell and Washington Counties and the northeastern City of Bristol through 545 AM EDT... At 456 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Trammel to near Chilhowie. Movement was southeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Bristol Va, Abingdon, Lebanon, Mountain City, Cleveland Va, Glade Spring, Damascus, Laurel Bloomery, Emory-Meadow View and Lindell. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
